name: electricity production, deep geothermal | electricity, high voltage | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20719/documentation

This dataset represents electricity production with a deep geothermal enhanced geothermal systems plant. The power generation unit is run on an Organic Rankine Cycle with Benzene as working fluid. ;Detailed information on this dataset is presented in the book "Energy from the Earth. 2015. Hirschberg, Wiemer, Burgherr (eds.) (see field "Data Generator and Publication").

This dataset starts from commissioned geothermal power plants ready to generate electricity.

This activity ends with the high voltage electricity produced at the power plant.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The Annual Production Volume is defined directly in the electricity market dataset, a placeholder value is used here.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Represents installation of a deep geothermal power plant in Switzerland. Used as first approximation for  this geography. Uncertainties adjusted accordingly.

publication.name: S Hirchberg, S Wiemer, P Burgherr2015
